top_stories.title: One of the Democrats Trump unlawfully fired from the FTC is back
top_stories.description: Four months after President Donald Trump defied Supreme Court precedent to remove two Democratic commissioners from the Federal Trade Commission without cause, one of those commissioners is returning to work. US District Court Judge Loren AliKhan called the attempted firing unlawful, finding that Rebecca Kelly Slaughter "remains a rightful member of the Federal Trade Commission" […]
top_stories.author: Lauren Feiner
top_stories.content: Four months after President Donald Trump defied Supreme Court precedent to remove two Democratic commissioners from the Federal Trade Commission without cause, one of those commissioners is returning to work. US District Court Judge Loren AliKhan called the attempted firing unlawful, finding that Rebecca Kelly Slaughter "remains a rightful member of the Federal Trade Commission" […]

top_stories.title: NIH scientists test in an animal model a surgical technique to improve cell therapy for dry AMD
top_stories.description: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.
top_stories.content: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.

top_stories.title: Day in the life of an SOC leader
top_stories.description: A security operations center (SOC) leader is the point person for an organization’s security operations. They run a team of security analysts, engineers, and other specialists. But what exactly do they do on a day-to-day basis?As the person managing the organization’s cybersecurity hub, the SOC leader has to navigate all the complexities that come with it. An effective SOC leader (also known as an SOC manager or security operations lead) balances strategy, technology, and team leadership...

top_stories.content: A security operations center (SOC) leader is the point person for an organization’s security operations. They run a team of security analysts, engineers, and other specialists. top_stories.title: Nested Forecasting: Analyzing the Relationship Between the Dollar and Stock Market Trends
top_stories.description: The prevailing opinion is that because countries are exporting more goods to the US than it exports to them, resulting in a trade deficit. In return for their exports, these countries receive US dollars, which they often use to purchase US government bonds and stocks. Over time, this process contributes ... Continue reading: Nested Forecasting: Analyzing the Relationship Between the Dollar and Stock Market Trends

top_stories.content: The prevailing opinion is that because countries are exporting more goods to the US than it exports to them, resulting in a trade deficit. top_stories.title: Build Your Own AI Assistant with RAG: A Practical Guide for GenAI Engineers
top_stories.description: “How can I make ChatGPT answer questions from my own documents?” If you’ve ever wondered that, you’re in the right place. Welcome to the world of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) — a powerful framework to make LLMs like GPT-4 smarter with your data.What is RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)?LLMs like GPT-4 are smart — but they don’t know your documents, PDFs, websites, or business knowledge. RAG is a technique that solves this by:Retrieving relevant chunks from your data.Augmenting the...
